Adversaries.Alerting_Strategy: In the Incident Analysis view, each node is a process with sub-nodes representing potentially malicious actions of that process. Events are distinguished with different colors and icons depending upon the action. Interacting with a node will show an enrichment alert view containing ATT&CK techniques and descriptions of what took place.
Adversaries.Correlation_Strategy: Each host in the environment has their own Incident Analysis view. In this view, process lineage is tracked, and events of those processes are correlated to the instigating process. There is a detailed Alerts Details for Behavioral Anomaly view that correlates events and alerts by timestamp where severity is listed (info, low, medium, high).
